edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Controllers

    Package Description
    edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Controllers  
    edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Views  
  • Classes in edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Controllers used by edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Controllers 
    Class and Description
    JavaClient
    JavaClient is the main runnable client-side application, it allows users to connect to a server on a specific port and chat with other connected users, as well as play games like tic tac toe, gomoku, and chess with them it is composed of a user list, a message box, input box and send button for chatting, and a panel area to display the lobby or current game
    JavaClientHelperMethods
    This class exists to provide helper methods for handleMessage() from JavaClient to make it more readable.
    TwoPlayerGameController
    Two Player Game Controller which should be extended from for all two player games.
  • Classes in edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Controllers used by edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Views 
    Class and Description
    TicTacToeController
    Tic Tac Toe Controller responsible for client game handling
